attributes.action: We demand the EU pay us back 50% of all money paid to the EU since Jan 1973
attributes.background: We've been feeding a never ending gravy train of lies and corruption for over 43 years, and received little in return.  Yet whenever the UK’s economy showed the slightest upturn, the greedy bureaucrats were out in force once again as usual with their greasy palms out looking for more and more!

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the EU, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out how to petition the European Parliament here:

http://www.europarl.europa.eu/atyourservice/en/20150201PVL00037/Petitions
